file_content.text: Detention center data system online. Scanning input memory core.
Core memory scan complete. LYSANNIS ADJUDICATION holorecordings available.
[Play holorecordings]
LYSANNIS ADJUDICATION SESSION 1 loading....
Recording "Rikael Lysannis Adjudication" session one. Captain Dragen presiding.
Master Lysannis, you're accused of criminal activity under Supreme Law 8814, aiding and abetting an enemy of the protectorate. How do you plead?
How do you think I plead? Not guilty! I don't even know what you're talking about.
This is a violation of my rights! Look--my father gives you people a lot of credits. He's not going to be happy about this!
That is entirely irrelevant. Your plea is now on record. This session is concluded.
You have no intention of even giving me a fair trial, do you? This is oppression, and I promise you, my father....
LYSANNIS ADJUDICATION SESSION 1 holorecording concluded. LYSANNIS ADJUDICATION SESSION 2 loading....
Play Session 2 holo-recording.
Recording "Rikael Lysannis Adjudication" session two. Captain Dragen presiding.
Master Lysannis, as you know, your alleged girlfriend, Mistress Daria Felton, failed to corroborate your alibi.

Mistress Felton's testimony, reports of six eyewitnesses and the blasters found in your residence are sufficient proof of your membership in the Black Sun crime syndicate. Do you have any closing statements?
You know what? I do. You idiots got me this time, but you should know, I've been running operations under your nose for years.
I've been working for the Black Sun since I was a kid. You people are pathetic.
Very well. Your closing statements have been recorded. This session is concluded.
You're gonna lose this war in the end! The Black Sun will rise!
LYSANNIS ADJUDICATION SESSION 2 holorecording concluded.
[Take data showing Justicar innocence]
Ejecting memory core. Process complete.
[Edit data to make Justicars look guilty]
SESSION 2 data removed. Ejecting memory core. Process complete.
Detention center data system shutting down.
[Log off]
Detention center data system shutting down.
Detention center data system offline.
Holorecording data ready for edit. Command?
Delete Session 2 Recording.
Cancel edit and eject.
